sn56.55:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso mahapathaviya satta kolatthimattiyo gulika upanikkhipeyya.
sn56.55:1.3: katamam nu kho bahutaram—ya va satta kolatthimattiyo gulika upanikkhitta, ayam va mahapathavi”ti?
sn56.55:1.4: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaram, yadidam—mahapathavi; appamattika satta kolatthimattiyo gulika upanikkhitta.
sn56.55:1.5: Sankhampi na upenti, upanidhampi na upenti, kalabhagampi na upenti mahapathavim upanidhaya satta kolatthimattiyo gulika upanikkhitta”ti.
